basic_info.description: I am a Software Engineer with a background in electrical engineering, primarily in the field of MEP private consulting. I thrive in breaking down complex problems into smaller pieces and tackling each component individually. I am driven by my curiosity and desire to grow my technical skill set.

projects.title: Snake
projects.description: A simple classic snake game that allows the user to use the arrows keys to control the movement of the snake around the game board to collect the red apples. The more apples the snakes eats the larger it will grow, users should be careful not to collide with the game borders or the snake itself otherwise it's game over.

projects.title: TunerHub
projects.description: TunerHub is a free social networking appilcation built for the car enthusiast. Car enthusiasts can upload photos of their cars and share them with the car community around the world. Users can also leave comments on all of the posts, as well as edit and delete their comments.

projects.title: Rated-Our
projects.description: 'Opinions are like...' well, you know the rest. Everybody's got one, and who DOESN'T have an opinion about their favorite (or least favorite) movies? Rated-Our is a full-stack PERN app that gives movie buffs a voice by creating an account to track and rate the movies they love, hate and everything in between. So sign up, login and get your Roger Ebert on! Let's go to the movies!
